message: Bob, I'm offering you this exceptional product for $1800000. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe the value it can bring to your business is immeasurable. Let's discuss this further.

I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1400000 doesn't reflect the true worth of this product. I'm willing to come down to $1600000, recognizing your interest.  This is a significant concession on my part, and I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1300000 for the product. I think this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $1300000 simply isn't enough. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1500000. This is a final compromise from my side, and I truly believe you'll be satisfied with the value this product provides.  Let's reach an agreement.

I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1250000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.
